      • init

        public void init(io.netty.channel.socket.SocketChannel channel)
        Description copied from class: BaseTCPInterface
        Initialize the SocketChannel created for this interface. This initialization method should attach handlers which eventually call StorkInterface.issueRequest(Request) and attach callbacks to the request to write the response back to the requestor.
        Specified by:
        init in class BaseTCPInterface
        Parameters:
        channel - the SocketChannel to initialize.
